CSSPrimitiveValuePrimitiveType.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The primitiveType read-only property of the
interface represents the type of a CSS value.

blockquote.para:
Note: This property was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSPrimitiveValuePrimitiveType.value: An unsigned short representing the type of the value. Possible values are:
